alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 8:32AM CDT until September 16 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN COLEMAN...NORTHWESTERN MCCULLOCH...SOUTHEASTERN RUNNELS AND NORTHEASTERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 831 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stacy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Gouldbusk and Waldrip around 835 AM CDT. Rockwood around 840 AM CDT. Lohn around 850 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, Fife, Mozelle, Whon, Us-283 Near The Mcculloch- Coleman County Line, Fisk, and Shields. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
